entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Pembroke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow or rain beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 08:57 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to freezing rain at times mixed with snow late this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 08:57 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:57 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
